description: Displays a summary of information about a recovery group's readiness status. Includes the readiness checks for resources in the recovery group and the readiness status of each one.

parameters.name: RecoveryGroupName
parameters.description: The name of a recovery group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token that identifies which batch of results you want to see.

nested_items.name: Readiness
nested_items.description: The readiness status at a recovery group level.

nested_items.name: ReadinessChecks
nested_items.description: Summaries of the readiness checks for the recovery group.

nested_items.name: Readiness
nested_items.description: The readiness status of this readiness check.

nested_items.name: ReadinessCheckName
nested_items.description: The name of a readiness check.
